# Vendor Documentation

Welcome to the Vendor documentation for the Vendor Portal. This section provides comprehensive guidance for submitting products, tracking submissions, and managing your product catalog.

## Vendor Role Overview

As a vendor user, you can submit products to the portal for review and approval. Your responsibilities include:

- **Product Submission**: Creating and uploading product data via Excel templates
- **Template Building**: Selecting categories and attributes for your products
- **Batch Tracking**: Monitoring the status of your product submissions
- **Product Management**: Viewing and managing your submitted products
- **Quality Assurance**: Ensuring product data is accurate and complete before submission

## Common Vendor Workflows

### Submitting Your First Products

1. **[Build an Excel template](./template-builder.md#building-templates)** with the categories and attributes you need
2. **Fill in the template** with your product data in Excel
3. **[Upload the completed file](./product-upload.md#upload-process)** through the upload wizard
4. **[Track your batch status](./batch-tracking.md#tracking-status)** and wait for admin review
5. View approved products in your **[product list](./product-management.md)**

### Responding to Batch Rejections

1. Check **[notifications](./notifications.md)** for rejection alerts
2. **[View rejection feedback](./batch-tracking.md#rejection-feedback)** in the batch detail page
3. Correct the issues in your Excel file
4. **[Re-upload the corrected file](./product-upload.md#fixing-errors)** as a new batch
5. Monitor the new batch for approval

### Managing Your Product Catalog

1. **[View all your products](./product-management.md#product-list)** in the Products page
2. **[Filter by status](./product-management.md#filtering)** to see approved, pending, or rejected products
3. **[View product details](./product-management.md#product-details)** to see attributes and approval history
4. Track which products have been synced

## Quick Reference

### Key Vendor Actions

| Action | Location | Documentation |
|--------|----------|---------------|
| Build Excel template | Template page | [Template Builder](./template-builder.md) |
| Upload products | Upload page | [Product Upload](./product-upload.md) |
| Track batch status | Batches page or Dashboard | [Batch Tracking](./batch-tracking.md) |
| View products | Products page | [Product Management](./product-management.md) |
| Check notifications | Notification bell | [Notifications](./notifications.md) |
| Update profile | Settings page | [Settings](./settings.md) |

### Navigation Tips

- Use the **sidebar menu** to access different sections
- The **notification bell** shows batch status updates
- **Dashboard widgets** provide quick access to recent batches
- Use **filters** on list pages to find specific products

## Best Practices

### Product Data Quality
- Ensure all required fields are filled in completely
- Use consistent naming conventions for products
- Double-check SKUs for accuracy and uniqueness
- Provide detailed, accurate product descriptions

### Template Usage
- Download a fresh template for each new product category
- Don't modify the template headers or structure
- Keep a backup of your completed templates
- Use the same template for similar products

### Upload Process
- Review validation errors carefully before re-uploading
- Upload products in manageable batches (50-100 products)
- Test with a small batch first if you're new to the system
- Upload during business hours for faster review

### Batch Management
- Monitor batch status regularly
- Respond to rejection feedback promptly
- Keep track of which batches have been approved
- Download batch files for your records

## System Requirements

### Supported Browsers

- Google Chrome (recommended) - version 90 or later
- Mozilla Firefox - version 88 or later
- Microsoft Edge - version 90 or later
- Safari - version 14 or later

### Excel Requirements

- Microsoft Excel 2016 or later
- Excel for Microsoft 365
- LibreOffice Calc 7.0 or later
- Google Sheets (with limitations)

**Note**: For best results, use Microsoft Excel to fill in templates. Some features may not work correctly in other spreadsheet applications.

### Internet Connection

- Stable internet connection required for uploads
- Minimum 1 Mbps upload speed recommended
- Larger files may require faster connections
